block.tconstruct.ichor_slime.tooltip: Sticks all sticky blocks besides ichor
block.tconstruct.ender_slime.tooltip: Sticks when pushed, but not when adjacent to a sticky block

block.tconstruct.lime_clear_stained_glas: Clear Light Green Stained Glass Pane

The introduction book into tools and materials

The reference book every tinker needs

item.tconstruct.iron_reinforcement.toolt: Reduces chance of a tool taking damage
item.tconstruct.cobalt_reinforcement.too: Increases armor resistance against general attacks
item.tconstruct.silky_cloth.tooltip: Prevents a tool from damaging block drops
item.tconstruct.silky_jewel.tooltip: Prevents a tool from damaging block drops
item.tconstruct.creative_slot.missing: Missing or invalid NBT defining the slot type
item.tconstruct.creative_slot.tooltip: Adds an additional %s slot to a tool
item.tconstruct.copper_can.tooltip: Stackable container holding 1 ingot of fluid
item.tconstruct.small_axe_head_red_sand_: Small Axe Head Red Sand Cast
item.tconstruct.broad_axe_head_red_sand_: Broad Axe Head Red Sand Cast
item.tconstruct.quartz_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with higher damage
item.tconstruct.flint_shuriken.tooltip: A throwable weapon with high knockback
item.tconstruct.earth_slime_sling.toolti:
Charge up, aim low, get flinging!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.sky_slime_sling.tooltip:
Charge up, let go, get back in the air!
Use Slime Boots if you value your life!
item.tconstruct.ender_slime_sling.toolti: Charge up, point it at a wall, come out the other side!
item.tconstruct.ichor_slime_sling.toolti: Charge up, point at a creature, and send it flying!
item.tconstruct.piggy_backpack.tooltip: Use on a mob to pick it up
block.tconstruct.part_chest.tooltip: Holds up to 256 different tool parts
block.tconstruct.tinkers_chest.tooltip: Holds up to 64 stacks of 16 items
item.tconstruct.pickaxe.description:
The Pickaxe is a precise mining tool. It is effective on stone and ores.
It breaks blocks, OK?
item.tconstruct.sledge_hammer.descriptio:
The Sledge Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests blocks in a wide range.
Also effective against undead.
item.tconstruct.vein_hammer.description: The Vein Hammer is a broad mining tool. It harvests many connected blocks of the same type, perfect for ores.
item.tconstruct.mattock.description:
The Cutter Mattock is a versatile farming tool. It is effective on wood, dirt, sand, gravel, and plants.
Just don't dig your own grave!
item.tconstruct.excavator.description:
The Excavator is a broad digging tool. It digs up large areas of soil and snow in a wide range.
Terraforming!
item.tconstruct.hand_axe.description:
The Hand Axe chops up wood and makes short work of leaves. It also makes for an effective weapon.
Chop chop!
item.tconstruct.broad_axe.description:
The Broad Axe fells small trees in a single swing, and makes quick work of large trees. It makes for a powerful heavy weapon.
Timber!
item.tconstruct.kama.description:
The Kama is a precision reaping tool, mowing down plants and shearing animals.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.scythe.description:
The Scythe is a broad reaping tool, mowing down plants in a wide area.
Right Click: Harvest and replant crops
item.tconstruct.dagger.description: The Dagger is a light weapon, capabile of quick strikes from either hand.
item.tconstruct.sword.description:
The Sword is a universal weapon. Sweep attacks keep enemy hordes at bay.
Also good against cobwebs!
item.tconstruct.cleaver.description: The Cleaver is a weapon for a smeltery master. High range attacks keep cut through the toughest of foes.
death.attack.tconstruct.smeltery_heat.pl: %1$s tried to make molten player whilst fighting %2$s

Plant on dirt or slimy dirt to make slimy nylium
Plant on dirt or slimy dirt to make slimy nylium

block.tconstruct.earth_slime_sapling.too: Only grows on slimy dirt or grass
block.tconstruct.sky_slime_sapling.toolt: Only grows on slimy dirt or grass
block.tconstruct.ender_slime_sapling.too: Only grows on slimy dirt or grass
material.tconstruct.wood.flavor: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
material.tconstruct.wood.encyclopedia: Makes repairs 50% more effective per part
material.tconstruct.stone.encyclopedia: Causes the tool to mine faster by half of the square root of lost durability
material.tconstruct.flint.flavor: This will spark the flames of a Tinker's heart!
material.tconstruct.flint.encyclopedia: Increases damage by a quarter of the square root of the lost durability
material.tconstruct.bone.flavor: I am the bone of my sword
material.tconstruct.bone.skull_encyclope: Grants resistance for 1 minute after drinking milk
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.flavor: Do you have a bone to pick with me?
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.encycl: Heals up to 5% of damage dealt per level
material.tconstruct.necrotic_bone.skull_: Melee attacks cause withering. After drinking milk the effect becomes faster
material.tconstruct.string.encyclopedia: Allows the tool to be repaired using string in the tinker station or crafting table
material.tconstruct.leather.flavor: Killed a cow, tanned it's hide.
material.tconstruct.leather.encyclopedia: Prevents the tool from taking more than 1 damage in an action
material.tconstruct.vine.flavor: Keeps living, unlike the social network.
material.tconstruct.vine.encyclopedia: Tool has up to a 75%% chance to resist damage in full sunlight
material.tconstruct.iron.flavor: Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.
material.tconstruct.iron.encyclopedia: Gives an extra 10% durability per part
material.tconstruct.iron.skull_encyclope: Melee attacks copy all negative status effects from the wearer to the target
material.tconstruct.seared_stone.encyclo: Gives +2.5 damage per level in heat, or -2.5 in cold areas
material.tconstruct.scorched_stone.encyc: Gives +2 damage per level against burning targets
material.tconstruct.copper.flavor: Don't let this tarnish your day.
material.tconstruct.copper.encyclopedia: Grants more mining speed at lower depths, up to +10% per level
material.tconstruct.copper.skull_flavor: Knocks the wind right out of them
material.tconstruct.copper.skull_encyclo: Melee attacks steal 3 seconds of air from the target
material.tconstruct.slimewood.flavor: Is this the wood of a slime or slime that's been infused with wood?
material.tconstruct.slimewood.encycloped: Gives a 5% chance per level of regenerating overslime each second
material.tconstruct.bloodbone.flavor: Isn't the blood supposed to be inside the bone?
material.tconstruct.bloodbone.encycloped: Boosts damage at low health, up to +4 damage per level at 1 heart
material.tconstruct.bloodbone.skull_ency: Projectiles cause slowness to the target. After drinking milk, melee attacks cause slowness and the level is stronger.
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.flavor: Disclaimer: Not actually made with roses.
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.encycloped: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.skull_flav: Putting that arm shield to good use
material.tconstruct.rose_gold.skull_ency: Boosts health by 1 heart, plus an additional heart per piece of golden armor.
material.tconstruct.chain.flavor: You too can become the chain user now.
material.tconstruct.skyslime_vine.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
material.tconstruct.skyslime_vine.encycl: Cancels out the mining speed reduction when not on the ground
material.tconstruct.slimesteel.flavor: You must steal the slime to get slimesteel.
material.tconstruct.slimesteel.encyclope: Grants 25 extra overslime, +50% of the total per level
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.flavor: This is not an obsidian part, if it was it would say "Obsidian."
material.tconstruct.nahuatl.encyclopedia: Has a 50% chance of doing up to 5 damage over time, more damage at higher levels
material.tconstruct.tinkers_bronze.flavo: Not to be confused with Bronze.
material.tconstruct.tinkers_bronze.encyc: Grants +10% to +15% mining speed per level at full durability, based on other modifiers
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.flavor: The absolute best material, no debates.
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.encyclopedi: Can be eaten to restore 1 hunger and 0.1 saturation per level
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.skull_flavo: You won't like me when I'm angry!
material.tconstruct.pig_iron.skull_encyc: Grants 15 seconds of strength when damaged by another mob
material.tconstruct.darkthread.flavor: Come to the dark side, we have sowing
material.tconstruct.darkthread.encyclope: Increases drop chances from mobs, stacking with luck
material.tconstruct.cobalt.flavor: Coblat. The material of the Red Army.
material.tconstruct.cobalt.encyclopedia: Boosts mining and attack speed by 7% per level
material.tconstruct.manyullyn.flavor: The metal that most Tinkers will never pronounce right. Also known as a star cutting material.
material.tconstruct.manyullyn.encycloped: Grants +2 damage per level after 8 consecutive hits
material.tconstruct.hepatizon.flavor: He-pa-ti-zon - boil it, mash it, put it in a stew.
material.tconstruct.hepatizon.encycloped: Boosts mining speed by 25% per level after mining 32 consecutive blocks
material.tconstruct.queens_slime.flavor: Princesses are evil, get yourself a Queen.
material.tconstruct.queens_slime.encyclo: Reduces durability by 15% per level, 66% of that going towards overslime
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.flavor: Harness the full power of the Nether Fortress - bone and blaze
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.encyclo: Grants +1% damage per second of fire, up to +15% from lava's 15 seconds. Bonus reduced by fire resistance.
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.skull_f: I told them this is technically firespit, not firebreath, but apparently I don't get to decide the names for things I invent
material.tconstruct.blazing_bone.skull_e: Allows spitting firecharges from the inventory as fireballs. Has a cooldown of 5 seconds and does not work underwater
material.tconstruct.ancient_hide.flavor: Leather tanned by the oldest of stone
material.tconstruct.ancient_hide.encyclo: Increases drop chances from blocks, stacking with luck
material.tconstruct.enderslime_vine.ency: Teleports the holder to the location of mined blocks or killed monsters
material.tconstruct.gunpowder.skull_flav: Whose nice things are being destroyed now, creeper?
material.tconstruct.gunpowder.skull_ency: Holding the helmet interact key causes the wearer to explode
material.tconstruct.ender_pearl.skull_fl: Endermen know how to stay away from harm, and scientists. They have been ignoring my interview requests for weeks!
material.tconstruct.ender_pearl.skull_en: Teleports automatically when attacked by a projectile, and randomly from melee. Has a 15 second cooldown
material.tconstruct.spider.skull_flavor: Spiders are a master of potions, maybe their secret can help me enhance potions...
material.tconstruct.spider.skull_encyclo: Causes positive potion effects to last 25% longer
material.tconstruct.venom.skull_flavor: Perfect for battles of wits, when you have to decide and drink to find out who is right.
material.tconstruct.venom.skull_encyclop: Makes the wearer immune to poison, though will not remove existing poison
material.tconstruct.rotten_flesh.skull_e: Melee attacks increase the targets fire time based on the wearer's fire time
material.tconstruct.gold.skull_encyclope: Causes some gold ores to drop extra gold nuggets, and increases drop chance of gold armor by 4%. Nuggets and armor drops are further boosted by each piece of golden armor worn.
material.tconstruct.osmium.flavor: Too dense to get most jokes
material.tconstruct.osmium.encyclopedia: Prevents 33% of damage at the cost of an extra 25% repair cost at first level
material.tconstruct.tungsten.flavor: Have you considered starting a heavy metal band?
material.tconstruct.tungsten.encyclopedi: Grants +10% mining speed and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.lead.flavor: Could try and make a sandwich out of this.
material.tconstruct.lead.encyclopedia: Grants +10% attack and -10% movement speed per level
material.tconstruct.silver.flavor: You know, this tool isn't going to look so shiny in a few days.
material.tconstruct.silver.encyclopedia: Gives +2.5 damage against undead per level
material.tconstruct.whitestone.flavor: Take your useless white metals and make a useful tool
material.tconstruct.whitestone.encyclope: Mining stone has a 20% per level of granting +3 stoneshield
material.tconstruct.bronze.flavor: Not to be confused with Tinker's Bronze.
material.tconstruct.bronze.encyclopedia: Grants +12.5% mining speed per level at full durability
material.tconstruct.steel.encyclopedia: Grants +4% durability, damage, and speed per level
material.tconstruct.constantan.flavor: Constantantantantantantan... Sorry it's fun to add more "tans."
material.tconstruct.constantan.encyclope: Grants +12.5% mining speed in extreme heat or cold
material.tconstruct.invar.encyclopedia: Grants +2.5 damage in biomes with neutral temperatures
material.tconstruct.electrum.encyclopedi: Grants +50% XP per level from blocks and monsters
material.tconstruct.necronium.flavor: This much decay probably only leaves it with a quarter life
material.tconstruct.necronium.encycloped: Causes at least 5 seconds of wither, to your target and at a 25% chance to you
material.tconstruct.plated_slimewood.fla: All the shininess of brass with the squish of slime
material.tconstruct.plated_slimewood.enc: Grants +100% to all methods of restoring overslime
modifier.tconstruct.empty.description: Fallback for when a modifier is missing
modifier.tconstruct.shiny.description: Tool glows with an enchanted glint
modifier.tconstruct.farsighted.descripti: Decreases the field of vision while equipped
modifier.tconstruct.nearsighted.descript: Increases the field of vision while equipped
modifier.tconstruct.offhanded.flavor: Don't think about it too hard
modifier.tconstruct.offhanded.descriptio: Disables the tools interaction abilities when the offhand is filled
Disables the tools interaction abilities entirely
modifier.tconstruct.reinforced.descripti: Tool is less likely to take damage
modifier.tconstruct.overforced.descripti: Tool is reinforced using slime, allowing more capacity for overslime
modifier.tconstruct.emerald.description: Increases durability depending on base durability! Illagers hate it!
modifier.tconstruct.worldbound.descripti: A crude version of netherite, granting immunity to external damage like fire, but no additional strength
modifier.tconstruct.soulbound.descriptio: Tool remains in inventory on death!
modifier.tconstruct.netherite.descriptio: Harness the power of ancient metal, making the tool stronger and immune to external damage such as fire
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.netherite_req: Netherite requires either diamond or emerald to be applied
modifier.tconstruct.overslime.descriptio: Tool consumes overslime instead of durability, until it runs out! Not friendly towards tools lacking slime
modifier.tconstruct.experienced.descript: Gain bonus XP from killing mobs and mining blocks
modifier.tconstruct.haste.description: Magic red dust makes tool swing and mine faster!
modifier.tconstruct.blasting.description: Your tool breaks blocks weak to explosions, such as ores, faster!
modifier.tconstruct.hydraulic.descriptio: Tool mines faster underwater or in the rain!
modifier.tconstruct.lightspeed.descripti: Tool mines well lit blocks faster!
modifier.tconstruct.knockback.descriptio: Hitting things makes them go flying further!
modifier.tconstruct.padded.description: Reduces the knockback of the tool, to stop your enemies from escaping
modifier.tconstruct.severing.flavor: Not just the heads, but the feet, and the feathers!
modifier.tconstruct.severing.description: Potentially blasts heads or other parts of mobs right off!
modifier.tconstruct.fiery.flavor: Infused with the fires of hell!
modifier.tconstruct.necrotic.description: Hitting enemies drains their life to heal you
modifier.tconstruct.piercing.description: Tool deals bonus damage which attacks through armor!
modifier.tconstruct.smite.description: Undead fear the might of the melon!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.flavor: That'sss a nice ssspider you have there!
modifier.tconstruct.bane_of_sssss.descri: Tool does bonus damage against spiders, creepers and other creepey crawly hissing things!
modifier.tconstruct.antiaquatic.descript: Tool does bonus damage to sea creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.cooling.description: Tool does bonus damage to fire based creatures!
modifier.tconstruct.sweeping_edge.descri: Targets of sweep attack take a larger percentage of this tool's damage
modifier.tconstruct.sharpness.descriptio: Tool is so much sharper, dealing more damage!
modifier.tconstruct.knockback_resistance: Anvils are heavy, so it should keep you from being knocked back, right?
modifier.tconstruct.golden.description: Gives your armor extra golden bling, piglins love it!
modifier.tconstruct.ricochet.description: Bounce away further when attacked, for effective escapes
modifier.tconstruct.revitalizing.descrip: Strengthens the heart, granting more hearts
modifier.tconstruct.embellishment.descri: Armor appearance changed to match a different material
modifier.tconstruct.dyed.description: Armor appearance changed to match a different material
modifier.tconstruct.protection.descripti: Increases protection to all damage types
modifier.tconstruct.melee_protection.des: Increases protection against direct physical damage
modifier.tconstruct.fire_protection.desc: Protects against damage from fire and reduces fire time
modifier.tconstruct.blast_protection.des: Protects against explosion damage and reduces knockback from explosions
modifier.tconstruct.magic_protection.des: Protects against damage from magical sources
modifier.tconstruct.turtle_shell.flavor: Tortoises go on land, turtles in the sea
modifier.tconstruct.turtle_shell.descrip: Increases protection underwater, along with swim speed
modifier.tconstruct.dragonborn.descripti: Increases protection and attack when airborne
modifier.tconstruct.thorns.description: Harness the power of the guardian, causing attackers to sometimes take damage
modifier.tconstruct.sticky.description: Attackers may become stuck in place, or at least slowed
modifier.tconstruct.springy.description: Attackers may bounce off your armor
modifier.tconstruct.zoom.description: Allows you to see far away objects when interacting while sneaking
modifier.tconstruct.slurping.description: Allows drinking the fluid in a helmet when interacting
modifier.tconstruct.aqua_affinity.descri: Removes the mining penalty from mining underwater
modifier.tconstruct.item_frame.descripti: Adds inventory slots to the helmet for items to observe. Perfect for clocks and compasses
modifier.tconstruct.knockback_armor.desc: Hitting things with any weapon makes them go flying further!
modifier.tconstruct.armor_power.flavor: Can you feel the power flowing through you?
modifier.tconstruct.strength.flavor: Can you feel the strength flowing through you?
modifier.tconstruct.unarmed.description: Causes chestplate modifiers to boost unarmed attack damage
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.unarmed: Requires the unarmed modifier to be added first
modifier.tconstruct.wings.description: Allows you to soar through the air by jumping while in mid air
modifier.tconstruct.speedy.flavor: Keep going and going and going...
modifier.tconstruct.speedy.description: Achieve speeds closer to that of rabbits
modifier.tconstruct.leaping.flavor: Leap tall buildings in a single bound!
modifier.tconstruct.leaping.description: This piston boost on your legs should allow you to reach higher heights
modifier.tconstruct.pockets.description: The pants have pockets, allowing you to store additional items which can be accessed by sneaking and interacting
modifier.tconstruct.shield_strap.flavor: Ideal to protect and to attack
modifier.tconstruct.shield_strap.descrip: Interacting with the leggings allows swapping the offhand item
modifier.tconstruct.tool_belt.descriptio: Interacting with the leggings allows swapping the hotbar
modifier.tconstruct.pocket_chain.descrip: Allows accessing all slots for tool belt or shield strap by sneaking and interacting, and adds +1 slot
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.pocket_chain: Pocket Chain requires Tool Belt or Shield Strap
modifier.tconstruct.inventory_cannot_rem: Making this change would cause an item stored in this tool to be deleted
modifier.tconstruct.soulspeed.descriptio: Increases movement speed on soul sand
modifier.tconstruct.lightspeed_armor.des: Moves faster in well lit areas
modifier.tconstruct.double_jump.descript: Lets you jump again in mid air. Higher levels add even more jumps!
modifier.tconstruct.bouncy.description: Causes the ground to reflect you, as if you are constantly on slime blocks
modifier.tconstruct.frost_walker.descrip: Causes water blocks to temporarily freeze
modifier.tconstruct.plowing.description: Tills the blocks in your path
modifier.tconstruct.snowdrift.descriptio: Leave a trail of snow like a snow golem
modifier.tconstruct.flamewake.descriptio: Leave a trail of fire in your wake
modifier.tconstruct.unbreakable.descript: Tool no longer takes damage from normal usage
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.unbreakable_r: Unbreakable requires Netherite and Reinforced V to apply
modifier.tconstruct.dual_wielding.descri: Can attack from the offhand, provided the main hand can also dual wield. Tools with dual wielding have reduced stats
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.two_handed_du: Two handed tools require Offhanded to gain dual wielding.
modifier.tconstruct.silky.description: Mined blocks drop themselves instead of the usual items
modifier.tconstruct.autosmelt.flavor: Fires of the Nether in your tool!
modifier.tconstruct.luck.description: Gives you more nice things when mining or killing mobs!
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.luck.level_2: Luckier requires a different recipe for the first level
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.luck.level_3: Luckiest requires a different recipe for the first two levels
modifier.tconstruct.fortune.description: Gives you more nice things when mining!
modifier.tconstruct.looting.description: Gives you more nice things when killing mobs!
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.looting.level: Looting II requires a different recipe for the first level
:ooting III requires a different recipe for the first two levels
modifier.tconstruct.expanded.description: Tool's area of effect is larger than before
modifier.tconstruct.reach.description: Can reach further blocks and mobs while holding this tool!
modifier.tconstruct.pathing.flavor: Where we're going, we need roads!
modifier.tconstruct.stripping.descriptio: Tool can strip bark from wood
modifier.tconstruct.glowing.description: Tool can place glow balls, consuming durability
modifier.tconstruct.exchanging.descripti: Blocks broken by this tool are replaced by the block in the offhand if possible
modifier.tconstruct.firestarter.descript: Tool can create fire on usage
modifier.tconstruct.fireprimer.descripti: Increases the area of fire of the tool
modifier.tconstruct.melting.flavor: The power of a Melter on a stick!
modifier.tconstruct.melting.description: Melts attacked entities and items dropped!
modifier.tconstruct.tank.description: Tool has a fluid tank, allowing it to store fluid
modifier.tconstruct.bucketing.descriptio: Tool can pickup liquid, or place it when crouching
modifier.tconstruct.spilling.description: Fluid contained in the weapon spills onto attacked targets, or when attacked for armor, causing effects based on the fluid
modifier.tconstruct.writable.description: More words. More upgrade. It's only logical!
modifier.tconstruct.harmonious.descripti: Allows an additional upgrade to live in harmony with the rest!
modifier.tconstruct.recapitated.descript: Sets this tool ahead by one upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.resurrected.descript: Respawns one of this tool's upgrade slots!
modifier.tconstruct.gilded.description: Trades an ability slot for two upgrade slots!
modifier.tconstruct.draconic.description: The head of the great beast allows your tool a second ability slot!
__comment: Three more +1 upgrade modifiers for modpacks
modifier.tconstruct.red_extra_upgrade.de: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.blue_extra_upgrade.d: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.extra_ability.descri: Ask your modpack maker to provide a resource pack giving this better lore
modifier.tconstruct.cultivated.descripti: Tool practically grows more material when repairing
modifier.tconstruct.jagged.description: Every point durability lost increases damage, but decreases mining speed
modifier.tconstruct.stonebound.descripti: The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage
modifier.tconstruct.fractured.descriptio: Tool is extra sharp due to the broken bits of bone
modifier.tconstruct.stringy.description: Tool can be repaired using string
modifier.tconstruct.tanned.description: Tool no longer takes double or more damage from certain actions
modifier.tconstruct.searing.description: Tool does bonus damage in hot areas, but less damage in cold ones
modifier.tconstruct.scorching.descriptio: Tool does bonus damage to targets that are on fire
modifier.tconstruct.dwarven.description: Tool mines faster the deeper you mine, just don't mine too deep
modifier.tconstruct.raging.description: Tool does more damage when the holder's health is low
modifier.tconstruct.enhanced.description: Rose gold goes great with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.tconstruct.airborne.description: Tool no longer is penalized when mining in the air
modifier.tconstruct.overcast.description: Overslime can be made extra thick on this tool
modifier.tconstruct.lacerating.descripti: Causes the target to bleed, dealing additional damage
modifier.tconstruct.maintained.descripti: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.lightweight.descript: Tool is incredibly light for its size, allowing you to attack and mine faster
modifier.tconstruct.tasty.description: Smells so good, you cannot resist taking a few bites of your tool
death.attack.tconstruct.bleed.item: %1$s bled to death from injuries caused by %2$s
modifier.tconstruct.overlord.description: Tool takes some of the durability as new overslime subjects
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.flavor: Not Fast Enough, Gotta Go Faster!
modifier.tconstruct.momentum.description: Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going
modifier.tconstruct.insatiable.descripti: During combat you deal more and more damage every time you hit an enemy
modifier.tconstruct.conducting.descripti: Tool deals multiplied damage when you are on fire
modifier.tconstruct.enderporting.flavor: Harness the power of the enderslime
modifier.tconstruct.enderporting.descrip: Tool teleports the holder to mined blocks or killed entities
modifier.tconstruct.dense.description: Tool lasts longer, but is harder to repair
modifier.tconstruct.sharpweight.descript: Mines faster, but is extremely hard to move
modifier.tconstruct.heavy.description: Hard to move while wielding, but it packs a heavy punch
modifier.tconstruct.stoneshield.descript: Mined stone protects the tool from future damage
modifier.tconstruct.ductile.description: Tool is longer lasting, mines faster, and damages more
modifier.tconstruct.maintained_2.descrip: Tool mines faster when at higher durability
modifier.tconstruct.temperate.descriptio: Tool mines faster when in extreme temperatures
modifier.tconstruct.invariant.descriptio: Tool does more damage in neutral temperatures
modifier.tconstruct.decay.description: Causes targets to wither away, but may also cause the holder to wither
modifier.tconstruct.overworked.descripti: Increases amount of overslime restored from all sources
modifier.tconstruct.self_destructive.des: Can explode by interacting with the helmet while sneaking
modifier.tconstruct.enderdodging.descrip: Allows dodging projectiles by teleporting, and randomly escape attacks by teleporting
modifier.tconstruct.frosttouch.flavor: An icy touch keeps the enemies away
modifier.tconstruct.frosttouch.descripti: Makes arrows cause slowness, drinking milk also slows on melee attack
modifier.tconstruct.withered.description: Withers targets of attacks, withering faster after drinking milk
modifier.tconstruct.boon_of_sssss.flavor: The potions are strong with this one
modifier.tconstruct.mithridatism.descrip: Immune to becoming poisoned, if only it worked on existing poison...
modifier.tconstruct.wildfire.description: Increases burn times of targets if you are burning
modifier.tconstruct.plague.description: Causes melee targets to catch whatever negative effects you have
modifier.tconstruct.breathtaking.descrip: Melee attacks take air from enemies
modifier.tconstruct.firebreath.descripti: Allows you to spit firecharges by interacting with your helmet
modifier.tconstruct.chrysophilite.descri: Increases gold gain from ores and monsters
modifier.tconstruct.gold_guard.descripti: Increases health based on how much gold you are wearing
modifier.tconstruct.revenge.description: Makes you stronger after you are attacked
modifier.tconstruct.creeper_disguise.des: Makes you look more like a creeper to other creepers
modifier.tconstruct.enderman_disguise.de: Makes you look more like a enderman to other endermen
modifier.tconstruct.skeleton_disguise.fl: Need more meat on those bones
modifier.tconstruct.skeleton_disguise.de: Makes you look more like a skeleton to other skeletons
modifier.tconstruct.stray_disguise.descr: Makes you look more like a stray to other strays
modifier.tconstruct.wither_skeleton_disg: 1/3 of the way to a wither
Makes you look more like a wither skeleton to other wither skeletons
modifier.tconstruct.spider_disguise.desc: Makes you look more like a spider to other spider
modifier.tconstruct.cave_spider_disguise: Makes you look more like a cave spider to other cave spiders
modifier.tconstruct.zombie_disguise.desc: Makes you look more like a zombie to other zombies
modifier.tconstruct.husk_disguise.descri: Makes you look more like a husk to other husks
modifier.tconstruct.drowned_disguise.des: Makes you look more like a drowned to other drowned
modifier.tconstruct.blaze_disguise.flavo: Would be more convincing if you were on fire
modifier.tconstruct.blaze_disguise.descr: Makes you look more like a blaze to other blazes
modifier.tconstruct.piglin_disguise.flav: Need some gold to complete the disguise
modifier.tconstruct.piglin_disguise.desc: Makes you look more like a piglin to other piglins
modifier.tconstruct.piglin_brute_disguis: Makes you look more like a piglin brute to other piglin brutes
modifier.tconstruct.zombified_piglin_dis: Is it a pig? A man? A zombie?
Makes you look more like a zombified piglin to other zombified piglins
modifier.tconstruct.the_one_probe.descri: Shows information about the targeted block when held or on a helmet.
tool_stat.tconstruct.attack_speed.descri:
Base value for attack speed calculations.
Roughly full strength attacks per second.
tool_stat.tconstruct.durability.descript:
The base-value for durability calculations.
Usually an integral part to the overall durability of a tool.
stat.tconstruct.head: Head
tool_stat.tconstruct.mining_speed.descri:
How fast a tool with a tool head of this material can mine blocks.
May be influenced by other toolparts.
tool_stat.tconstruct.harvest_level.descr: What range of blocks a tool with a tool head of this material can mine.
tool_stat.tconstruct.attack_damage.descr:
Base value for attack calculations.
The end result depends on the tool itself and the other components used.
tool_stat.tconstruct.armor.description: How much this protects you when worn.
tool_stat.tconstruct.armor_toughness.des: How much this armor resists high damage blows.
tool_stat.tconstruct.knockback_resistanc: How much this armor reduces knockback.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.durability.d: The total durability of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_damag: The total attack damage of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.attack_speed: The total attack speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tool_stat.tconstruct.handle.mining_speed: The total mining speed of the tool will be multiplied by this.
tooltip.tconstruct.part.missing_stats:
Material is missing the required stats:
{0}
gui.tconstruct.crafting_station.uncrafta: This item is not currently craftable by the player
gui.tconstruct.part_builder.info:
Here you can craft tool parts to fulfill your tinkering fantasies.

To craft a part simply put a blank pattern into the left slot and select the part you want. The remaining slot holds the material you want to craft your part out of.
Material cannot be shaped in the part builder. Other methods such as casting are required.
gui.tconstruct.tinker_station.repair_lim: Allows creating all basic tools and applying most modifiers. Select a layout from the buttons on the left to get started.
gui.tconstruct.tinker_station.repair.des: Create both small and broad tools and modify existing tools to fulfil your dreams! Select a layout from the buttons on the left to get started.
gui.tconstruct.tinker_station.info: The main way to repair or change your tools. Place a tool and a material on the left to get started.
recipe.tconstruct.overslime.at_capacity: Tool has no more space for overslime
recipe.tconstruct.remove_modifier.no_mod: Tool does not have any removable modifiers
recipe.tconstruct.part_swapping.too_many: Table is too small to swap parts on this tool
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.not_enough_sl: Need at least 1 %s slot to add this modifier
Need at least %s %s slots to add this modifier
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.validate_slot: This change leaves the tool with too few %s slots
recipe.tconstruct.modifier.requirements_: Tool state invalid for one of the modifiers. Contact your modpack maker and request a more descriptive error.
gui.tconstruct.caption: Caption
gui.tconstruct.general.hover: Hover over the entries for more information
gui.tconstruct.error.invalid_pattern: Pattern does not contain a valid tool part!
gui.tconstruct.error.useless_tool_part:
This part can not be used to craft any tool!

Either the material %s is missing some information or no tool uses a(n) %s in its crafting.

Not enough durability to replace parts!
%d more durability required.
